title: did you know, GD...
body:
It's ok to be big on drinks like water and tea, but also enjoy things like coffee and soda at the same time?

did you know....there is no rule stating you have to make your preferences and tastes all follow a narrow set of themes and conditions?

http://media1.popsugar-assets.com/files/2015/03/16/013/n/1922398/7631c1e5_edit_img_cover_file_15954515_1426545300_Screen_Shot_20Waqy7b.xxxlarge/i/3D-GIFs.jpg
